Question: Altair CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Altair

CES 2024

- Altair will showcase its latest innovations in AI, HPC, and simulation for automotive, aerospace, and tech at CES 2024.

- The exhibit will feature advancements in technology, computational science, AI use cases, and virtual product development for various sectors.

- Attendees can schedule two-hour slots to connect with Altair's senior management team and gain insights into industry trends and Altair's offerings.

- Altair's flagship annual event, Future.Industry 2024, will explore the "Science of Possibility" virtually on March 6-7, focusing on computational science, AI, data analytics, and high-performance computing.

- The event will include speakers from premier organizations and offer content covering various disciplines and industries.

- Future.Industry 2024 will take place in three time zones and feature live audio translations into eight languages.
